pets.name: Animated Cloak
pets.description: This fabric cloaks something sinister, something from beyond.

pets.name: Ghastly Worm
pets.description: The tiniest fragment of eldritch power that has taken on a primal shape.

pets.name: Otherworldly Shard
pets.description: Splintered off from something unearthly, it hums and pulses slowly but intensely.

masks.name: Intangible Nightmare
masks.description: Shapeless, incomprehensible, but so much more than what the human mind can conjure.

masks.name: Masked Phantom
masks.description: No more than a sliver of a shade from beyond the veil.
